title: How do you MF?

replies.body:
Miss Fortune is one of the strongest 1v1 champions at any point of the game. Max Q use Q just after an auto as an auto reset. When poking try to Q a minion and make it bounce on them so it does more damage, Max W second Don't do 2 auto trades, when you trade do 3-5 autos or just all in. You *should* out damage every other adc. Supports pay a big role. 

:3 {{champion:51}}

okie doke. thanks for the tips. I played her and it went ok. Got two triples. Should of had 2 pentas but im bad. Died a lot too because im bad. Still, i don't find her as useless as i used to.

Went 20-14-14 for those interested.

I get it now. the "stacking" W's. like you want multiple autos on the same target and you will melt them. Which is why you want extended trades. Can't chicken out of a 1v1 early

Early just remember your aim is to Q them when they hide behind the minions.

You win most of early laning phase (in the same respect as a caitlyn) and with a thresh/blitz you force them to be in a really bad spot of having no where they can hide.

mf is not a duelist, she is a poker/teamfighting adc. 

if you want duelist take graves, vayne (takes a fair bit of learning), draven (harder then kog), quinn, kog (needs a lot of peel)

Graves isn't a duelist, his a burst Anti-ADC

Also Hypercarrys (Vayne/Kog) aren't really duelists either.
graves can duel most adcs early game 1v1 so he is a duelist, kog has highest damage out of any adc, and vayne has also got great dueling kit with the stun/condemn

MF is all about the Q poke, and learning to AA reset with said Q.

And then at 6 she is about AoE ulting.

> MF is all about the Q poke, and learning to AA reset with said Q.
> 
> And then at 6 she is about AoE ulting.

yeah but i feel like her ult does nothing. I was told its about applying her impure shots but really, i dont see the damage

It's more about how you use it and the team comp your in, you want something like a malphite, Yasuo, Orianna to help so that you are getting out massive AoE damage, the fact is your doing a lot more then other ADC's when your hitting all 5 champions with the Magic damage she is doing.

The stacks are mediocre in themselves (unless you've managed to stack someone up and then fire your ult.) but in a good wombo team her damage means a whole lot more.

Her ult early is actually kind of useless, and probably better used as a wave clearing tool or a get a kill from under tower tool (her range on it is quite large) but late game you end up doing 1k damage + 216% of your AD in an AoE cone, which is why she is amazing with the wombo (or against a really bad team)

Q max is usually best. Theres a lot of ways to build her, some people go for IE, trinity, BORK. Some people even go mage fortune, but I doubt thats what you are looking for.

She is quite strong in lane, and out of lane, she just lacks an escape for someone who jumps on her. I like to pick her vs volibear.
